lexUnit.name: boulevard.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a wide street, typically one lined with trees.

sentence.text: Scraps of the local railway system , which died in the 1930s , can be seen imbedded in Los Angeles boulevards like fragments of a lost civilisation .
